product_name: Columbia PFG Skipcast Polarized Sunglasses - Special Buy
long_description: Enjoy sunny skies without squinting to see.The PFG Skipcast Polarized Sunglasses from Columbia keep your view sharp and clear during any activity thanks to glare-reducing polarized lenses. Rimless, free-floating lenses provide unobstructed views and lightweight comfort. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Adjustable nosepads and temple tips become tacky when damp, ensuring sunglasses stay securely in place even if wet or sweaty. Special buy.
short_description: Enjoy sunny skies without squinting to see.The PFG Skipcast Polarized Sunglasses from Columbia keep your view sharp and clear during any activity thanks to glare-reducing polarized lenses.
